Uses of Interface
javax.jdo.PersistenceManager

  • Packages that use PersistenceManager 
    Package Description
    javax.jdo
    This package contains the JDO specification interfaces and classes.
    javax.jdo.spi
    This package contains the interfaces and classes used by JDO implementations.

    • Uses of PersistenceManager in javax.jdo

      Methods in javax.jdo that return PersistenceManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PersistenceManager Transaction.getPersistenceManager()
      The Transaction instance is always associated with exactly one PersistenceManager.
      PersistenceManager Query.getPersistenceManager()
      Get the PersistenceManager associated with this Query.
      PersistenceManager PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManager()
      Get an instance of PersistenceManager from this factory.
      PersistenceManager Extent.getPersistenceManager()
      An Extent is managed by a PersistenceManager; this method gives access to the owning PersistenceManager.
      static PersistenceManager JDOHelper.getPersistenceManager(Object pc)
      Return the associated PersistenceManager if there is one.
      PersistenceManager PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManager(String userid, String password)
      Get an instance of PersistenceManager from this factory.
      PersistenceManager PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManagerProxy()
      Get a thread-safe instance of a proxy that dynamically binds on each method call to an instance of PersistenceManager.

    • Uses of PersistenceManager in javax.jdo.spi

      Methods in javax.jdo.spi that return PersistenceManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PersistenceManager StateInterrogation.getPersistenceManager(Object pc)
      Return the associated PersistenceManager if there is one.
      PersistenceManager StateManager.getPersistenceManager(PersistenceCapable pc)
      Return the PersistenceManager that owns this instance.
      PersistenceManager PersistenceCapable.jdoGetPersistenceManager()
      Return the associated PersistenceManager if there is one.
